headline: Kimco Leadership Changes Highlight Focus On Continuity And Capital Discipline
summary: Kimco Realty (NYSE:KIM) announced a transition in its Chief Accounting Officer position. Chief Operating Officer David Jamieson has been appointed to the company’s board of directors. Executive Vice President and Treasurer Paul Westbrook plans to retire, with Senior Vice President Kathleen Thayer set to succeed him. The company outlined this leadership transition plan as part of a broader refresh of its executive team. Kimco Realty focuses on open air, grocery anchored shopping centers, a...
